name: Letter from Wendell Berry to VA

metadata.name: Letter from Wendell Berry to VA 1/100
metadata.description:
A response letter from WB to VA 

October 6th, 2014

"Dear Mr. Ansley, 

Thank you for your gracious letter and its several kindnesses. I value highly your intention to carry your education home, and I hope you can turn it to the advantage both of your place and yourself. 

Yours sincerely, 
Wendell Berry"

properties.name: Letter from Wendell Berry to VA
